content: Investments Online Brokerages FSM One Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 Jun 2019What are the community's thoughts on sweep account facilities?Saw that FSMone has introduced their new auto-sweep account that promises higher returns than cash account, would like to know thoughts about it? Thank you.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 13 Jun 2019It is not something new. Other brokers like Philips have done something similar.Good for parking for investment funds and always be ready to deploy them quickly and earn some interest while waiting.Do note that this type of accounts are not covered under SDIC unlike our local banks where deposit and savings account are covered by SDIC. So, I guess don't park everything inside just to be safe.0 comments1
